item.description:
Our first tennis lesson was amazing and we had the most fun!  If you did not attend the 1st lesson on May 3rd, and there is room you may rsvp for this lesson. You pay $20 (per hour) as you go to each lesson (on Tuesdays for now).  If you attend 4 classes, you can get the 4th lesson free. 

If you rsvp'd for the May 3rd lesson and were a no show, it is possible you will be wait listed so that others that are serious have a chance to sign up.  The Hingham Country Club is near the Hingham commuter line so it is very easy to get to. 

IF YOU HAVE NOT ALREADY ANSWERED THE REQUIRED QUESTIONS, PLEASE DO SO AFTER YOU RSVP TO THIS MEETUP.

The club has their own rackets, and the instructor will determine what your skill level is within the first 10 minutes. He will match us up appropriately depending on your skill levels.

Once we get more daylight we may change the lessons to 6:30 so that people can get there from work.

*When: Tuesday, May 10th @ 6-7:00 or 7:30(depending how long you want to go)

*Where: South Shore Country Club, Hingham

*Why: Tennis is a fun and great form of exercise!

*Event Organizer(s): Chandra

*Cost: $20 for first hour, $10 for next 1/2 hour.  CASH ONLY.

*Min/Max: Minimum of 6 Yes RSVPs by Noon on Saturday, May 7th. Maximum: 12

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions are posted on the "Directions to Frequently Used Venues" Discussion Thread on the Message Board.
item.how_to_find_us: Park next to tennis courts and find us on the tennis courts outside

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Tuesday Night Tennis Lessons!
